name: A. Birthday
statement:
Ivan is collecting coins. There are only N different collectible coins,
Ivan has K of them. He will be celebrating his birthday soon, so all his
M freinds decided to gift him coins. They all agreed to three terms:
Everyone must gift as many coins as others. All coins given to Ivan must
be different. Not less than L coins from gifts altogether, must be new
in Ivan’s collection.But his friends don’t know which coins have Ivan
already got in his collection. They don’t want to spend money so they
want to buy minimum quantity of coins, that satisfy all terms,
irrespective of the Ivan’s collection. Help them to find this minimum
number of coins or define it’s not possible to meet all the terms.
